START_TIP: Try to move the character towards the React symbol or the surprise box
REACT_TIP: Press R to enter the React mode
MISTERY_BLOCK_TIP: Press M to encounter a surprise üòõ

REACT.INITIAL: Dear human, if you want to beat me, shoot the targets first
REACT.FIRST_TARGET: yaay, you hit the first target
REACT.KEEP_GOING: I see you are a good shooter...
REACT.LOOK_AROUND: Look around, there are more targets to be hit
REACT.LAST_TARGET: I doubt you can find the last one
REACT.OVERTROWN: You have overtrown me, human. I have no choice but to surrender
REACT.FINAL: You might have won this time, but will you knock all of my friends down? üòà Press B to go back to the initial scene
